FuncDef: By default, BGP UCMP is disabled.
ParentView: BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view,BGP view
ExtraInfo: If there are multiple egresses to the destination, if the load-balancing ucmp command is run when BGP routes are available for load balancing, the device can implement unequal-cost load balancing among BGP routes based on the Link Bandwidth attribute carried in the routes.
